goal.ch: Our objective is to learn several common approaches in the of quantum mechanics and to get acquainted with some pivotal examples.
goal.en: Our objective is to learn several common approaches in the of quantum mechanics and to get acquainted with some pivotal examples.

outline.ch:
- some pivotal experiments that lead to the birth of quantum mechanics
- the Schrodinger equation; correspondence principle; interpretation of wave functions
- time-independent Schrodinger equation; energy eigenfunctions
- examples: 1-D square well, harmonic oscillator, hydrogen atom
- matrix algebra, the bra-ket notation, and the Hilbert space
- symmetry in quantum mechanics, rotational group and angular momentum
- time-independent perturbation theory; examples (Zeeman effect, Stark effect, etc.)
- path-integral formalism
Note: For those who cannot attend the first lecture due to covid-19 protocols or other personal reasons, please use the following google meet to join us: fzv-bmbd-fpj .
